name: town-map
effect: Displays a map of the region including the trainer's position, location names, visited towns, gym locations, and where the trainer has been walking recently.
short_effect: Use to see the overworld map.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Can be viewed
anytime. Shows your
present location.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows your 
present location.
